duties_responsibilities.duty: Obtain a deep understanding of Finance business area(s) and business processes to recommend solutions and build high-quality requirements.
Shape business requirements by making recommendations and suggesting alternatives to proposed solutions.
Participate in Application Configuration, Analysis, Management, and Maintenance in an Enterprise environment.
Provides functional consulting on complex SAP projects including rollouts.
Design and deliver solutions through system configuration and/or development that meet overall business requirements.
Interface with COE functional experts and business process owners to facilitate process improvement and develop new functionality.
Support user training activities.
Lead and/or participate in delivery of projects.
Respond, resolve, or escalate reported incidents.
Responsible for coordinating application needs from back-end platforms through user interface.
Create artifacts as appropriate, including business case documentation, scope documentation, detailed functional requirements, operational requirements, process flows, and test cases.
Understand technical options, limitations, costs, and risks.
Communicate tradeoffs to business partners and work with them to shape requirements accordingly.
Help resolve competing priorities between stakeholder groups by facilitating stakeholder discussions and escalate issues where appropriate.
Follow established methodology for the identification and documentation of business requirements.
Create and maintain application operational and instructional documentation, as necessary.
Provide Level 2 and Level 3 on-call coverage support.
Monitor, record, investigate, and diagnose system faults and errors to resolve technical issues and respond to requests for support.
Benchmark current and future processes against industry best practices.
Support the adoption of solutions by sponsoring business departments.
Manage projects with limited scope.
Mentor junior Analysts.
Analyze business process potentials for streamlining and improvements in efficiencies.
Work with IT management and Business Analysts to provide direction in large cross-functional teams.
Provide technical training assistance for users, applications programming team, and other staff.
Lead process improvements and IT projects.
Lead collaboration with business for documentation of As-Is and To-Be Processes.
Identify opportunities to innovate and differentiate the organization from its competition.
Manage projects with cross functional teams and of global scope.
Analyze requirements, design and develop solutions, coordinate testing, and implement technologies, enhancements, and incident/problem resolutions.
Viewed as a subject matter expert in the field within the organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required (Computer Science or related field preferred), Master's Degree preferred.
